e: ￹`Sonien~ `ko~ `paliding~ `iso~.￺Blow the horn of your vehicle.￻按你車子的喇叭看看
￹`Ma~`tengil~ `ako~ `ko~ `soni~ `no~ `'edo~.￺I heard the sound of a rat.￻我聽到老鼠的聲音
￹`Tata'ang~ `ko~ `soni~ `noya~ `kikay~.￺That motor makes a lot of noise.￻那個引擎的聲音很大
￹`Ano~ `soni~ `ira~ `ko~ `wawa~ `ako~.￺My child will be here soon.￻待會兒我的孩子要來
￹`Isoni~ `ira~ `cingra~.￺He came a little bit ago.￻他剛剛才來的
